/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and trucks are scattered throughout the scene, hinting at the busy traffic typical of a Chinese city. The image is bathed in bright sunlight, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
